title: The Silhouette
description: In this Dateline classic, a husband shoots his wife, saying he mistook her for an intruder one early morning in San Antonio, Texas. Was this a terrible accident or a case of deliberate murder? Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 16, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
